entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Placentia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:46 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 12:14 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending in the morning then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:14 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 in the evening then light overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 12:14 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023
